channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - _429
item.description: Message ERB429I Map: SMF74A Based on: dms Description Message ERB429I Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dms.

item.title: Field - agc
item.description: The Alias Management Group number defined on the physical controller for this device. This number is valid if the device belongs to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 1 of SMF74CN2 is set Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74AGC Description The Alias Management Group number defined on the physical controller for this device. This number is valid if the device belongs to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 1 of SMF74CN2 is set

item.title: Field - ags
item.description: The Alias Management Group number assigend by z/OS for this device on this system. This number is valid if the device belongs to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 1 of SMF74CN2 is set Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74AGS Description The Alias Management Group number assigend by z/OS for this device on this system. This number is valid if the device belongs to a DASD subsystem that supports Alias Management Groups and bit 1 of SMF74CN2 is set

item.title: Field - alc
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS ALLOCATED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74ALC Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS ALLOCATED

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - atd
item.description: Number of times I/Os were subjected to imposed delays due to PAV alias throttling Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74ATD Description Number of times I/Os were subjected to imposed delays due to PAV alias throttling

item.title: Field - atv
item.description: DEVICE ACTIVE TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74ATV Description DEVICE ACTIVE TIME

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cap
item.description: DASD volume capacity (in cylinders) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CAP Description DASD volume capacity (in cylinders)

item.title: Field - cfc
item.description: =1 Device connected to Ficon Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description =1 Device connected to Ficon Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - cfl
item.description: Configuration Change Flags Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74CFL Description Configuration Change Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description dca 0 Configuration Changed this interval. iac 1 Configuration Changed since last IPL iod 2 System IPLed via IODF icv 3 I/O Configuration Token is valid.

item.title: Field - clf
item.description: Flags for each device class Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CLF Description Flags for each device class Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rnr 0 Flag number option active rsg 1 Flag SG option active rcs 2 Flag for SG name changed during the interval mts 3 Open mount at interval start mte 4 Open mount at interval end clw 6 CTC with special protocol

item.title: Field - clw
item.description: CTC with special protocol Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Description CTC with special protocol Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field clf.

item.title: Field - cmb
item.description: =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Description =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - cmr
item.description: Initial command response time in units of 128 microseconds Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CMR Description Initial command response time in units of 128 microseconds

item.title: Field - cn2
item.description: Device Flag Extension 2 Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CN2 Description Device Flag Extension 2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description hwr 0 =1 HyperWrite requested xpv 1 =1 Device in SuperPAV mode sir 2 =1 Device is capable of synch I/O read requests siw 3 =1 Device is capable of synch I/O write requests

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnf
item.description: DEVICE FLAGS Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CNF Description DEVICE FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lcd 1 =1 IF NO LCU DATA cmb 2 =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID del_ 3 =1 Device has been deleted par 4 =1 ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS AVAILABLE vac 6 DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION sta 7 =1 at interval end online or offline devices indicated to be monitored

item.title: Field - cni
item.description: =1 If device connect time is invalid Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description =1 If device connect time is invalid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - cnn
item.description: DEVICE CONNECT TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CNN Description DEVICE CONNECT TIME

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cnx
item.description: Device Flag Extension see also SMF74CNF above Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CNX Description Device Flag Extension see also SMF74CNF above Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description dyc 0 Device Dynamically Changed ddt 1 =1 If device disconnect time is invalid pav 2 =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume nxc 3 =1 If number of alias exposures changed ntf 4 Timing facility not active cni 5 =1 If device connect time is invalid hpv 6 =1 If HyperPAV base device cfc 7 =1 Device connected to Ficon

item.title: Field - cof
item.description: NUMBER OF REQUESTS THAT HAD CONNECT TIME OVERFLOW Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74COF Description NUMBER OF REQUESTS THAT HAD CONNECT TIME OVERFLOW

item.title: Field - cu
item.description: Control unit name Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CU Description Control unit name

item.title: Field - cuq
item.description: Control Unit Queuing Time Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74CUQ Description Control Unit Queuing Time

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - dca
item.description: Configuration Changed this interval. Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Description Configuration Changed this interval. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - dcf
item.description: Flags for DASD class Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74DCF Description Flags for DASD class Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description nrf 0 Flag to cause two report areas sgf 1 Flag to cause sort by SG

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DEVICE CNTL SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DCL Description LENGTH OF DEVICE CNTL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE CNTL SECTIONS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DCN Description NUMBER OF DEVICE CNTL SECTIONS

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DEVICE CNTL SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DCS Description OFFSET TO DEVICE CNTL SECTION

item.title: Field - dct
item.description: Configuration Token for self-describing devices valid if SMF74SND = 0 Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DCT Description Configuration Token for self-describing devices valid if SMF74SND = 0

item.title: Field - ddl
item.description: LENGTH OF DEVICE DATA SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DDL Description LENGTH OF DEVICE DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - ddn
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DDN Description NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS

item.title: Field - dds
item.description: OFFSET TO DEVICE DATA SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DDS Description OFFSET TO DEVICE DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - ddt
item.description: =1 If device disconnect time is invalid Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description =1 If device disconnect time is invalid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - del_
item.description: =1 Device has been deleted Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Description =1 Device has been deleted Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - dev
item.description: Device name Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DEV Description Device name

item.title: Field - dis
item.description: DEVICE DISCONNECT TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DIS Description DEVICE DISCONNECT TIME

item.title: Field - dms
item.description: Message flags Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74DMS Description Message flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description _429 0 Message ERB429I sme 1 SMS Interface Error

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - dts
item.description: indentify source of Token Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DTS Description indentify source of Token Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description srd 0 if set: self desc. device snd 1 if set: no self desc. device 4-byte device number stored shv 3 ON = SMF74SHR indication is valid shr 4 ON = device is shared/assigned to multiple systems

item.title: Field - dvb
item.description: device busy delay time Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74DVB Description device busy delay time

item.title: Field - dyc
item.description: Device Dynamically Changed Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description Device Dynamically Changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - ecm
item.description: On = extended CMB Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Description On = extended CMB Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field enf.

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - enf
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74ENF Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ecm 0 On = extended CMB sts 1 On = model dependent data not available by STSCH fcm 2 On = initial command response time valid (SMF74CMR) fid 3 On = interrupt delay time valid (SMF74IDT)

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fcm
item.description: On = initial command response time valid (SMF74CMR) Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Description On = initial command response time valid (SMF74CMR) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field enf.

item.title: Field - fid
item.description: On = interrupt delay time valid (SMF74IDT) Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Description On = interrupt delay time valid (SMF74IDT) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field enf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gen
item.description: TOTAL NUMBER OF DEVICES SYSGENED FOR ALL CLASSES Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74GEN Description TOTAL NUMBER OF DEVICES SYSGENED FOR ALL CLASSES

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - hpc
item.description: Number of HyperPAV aliases configured for that LSS Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74HPC Description Number of HyperPAV aliases configured for that LSS

item.title: Field - hpv
item.description: =1 If HyperPAV base device Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description =1 If HyperPAV base device Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - hwr
item.description: =1 HyperWrite requested Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Description =1 HyperWrite requested Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cn2.

item.title: Field - iac
item.description: Configuration Changed since last IPL Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Description Configuration Changed since last IPL Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - icv
item.description: I/O Configuration Token is valid. Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Description I/O Configuration Token is valid. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - idt
item.description: Interrupt delay time in units of microseconds. This field is zero if not supported by the hardware. Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74IDT Description Interrupt delay time in units of microseconds. This field is zero if not supported by the hardware.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - iod
item.description: System IPLed via IODF Map: SMF74A Based on: cfl Description System IPLed via IODF Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cfl.

item.title: Field - ios
item.description: IOS Queue time in microseconds (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74IOS Description IOS Queue time in microseconds (short floating point)

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - lcd
item.description: =1 IF NO LCU DATA Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Description =1 IF NO LCU DATA Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - lcu
item.description: LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT NUMBER Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74LCU Description LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT NUMBER

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - lsn
item.description: Logical SMF record sequence number for device class Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74LSN Description Logical SMF record sequence number for device class

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mct
item.description: Maximum number of allocated tape devices Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74MCT Description Maximum number of allocated tape devices

item.title: Field - mec
item.description: MEASUREMENT EVENT COUNT (NUMBER OF SSCH FOR WHICH CONNECT, PENDING, AND ACTIVE TIME WERE STORED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74MEC Description MEASUREMENT EVENT COUNT (NUMBER OF SSCH FOR WHICH CONNECT, PENDING, AND ACTIVE TIME WERE STORED

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - msm
item.description: On = There are more logical SMF records in device class Map: SMF74A Based on: smf Description On = There are more logical SMF records in device class Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field smf.

item.title: Field - mtc
item.description: Number of mount conditions Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74MTC Description Number of mount conditions

item.title: Field - mte
item.description: Open mount at interval end Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Description Open mount at interval end Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field clf.

item.title: Field - mtp
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED A MOUNT PENDING CONDITION Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74MTP Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED A MOUNT PENDING CONDITION

item.title: Field - mts
item.description: Open mount at interval start Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Description Open mount at interval start Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field clf.

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - nda
item.description: Total number of allocations in effect for the device Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NDA Description Total number of allocations in effect for the device

item.title: Field - ndn
item.description: 4-byte device number in EBCDIC format, if SMF74SND = 1 Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NDN Description 4-byte device number in EBCDIC format, if SMF74SND = 1

item.title: Field - nm2
item.description: Device number same as SMF74NUM Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NM2 Description Device number same as SMF74NUM

item.title: Field - nrd
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS NOT READY Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NRD Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS NOT READY

item.title: Field - nrf
item.description: Flag to cause two report areas Map: SMF74A Based on: dcf Description Flag to cause two report areas Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dcf.

item.title: Field - nss
item.description: Number of skipped samples caused by too large delta values Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NSS Description Number of skipped samples caused by too large delta values

item.title: Field - ntf
item.description: Timing facility not active Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description Timing facility not active Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - num
item.description: DEVICE NUMBER Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NUM Description DEVICE NUMBER

item.title: Field - nux
item.description: Number of exposures, if multiple exposure device. In case of HyperPAV base device, SMF74HPV = 1, number of accumulated HyperPAV aliases Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74NUX Description Number of exposures, if multiple exposure device. In case of HyperPAV base device, SMF74HPV = 1, number of accumulated HyperPAV aliases

item.title: Field - nxc
item.description: =1 If number of alias exposures changed Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description =1 If number of alias exposures changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - nxt
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS IN FOLLOWING BROKEN RECORDS FOR THIS LOGICAL DEVICE CLASS RECORD Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74NXT Description NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS IN FOLLOWING BROKEN RECORDS FOR THIS LOGICAL DEVICE CLASS RECORD

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - par
item.description: =1 ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS AVAILABLE Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Description =1 ONLY PARTIAL STATISTICS AVAILABLE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - pav
item.description: =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Map: SMF74B Based on: cnx Description =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cnx.

item.title: Field - pct
item.description: Number of unsuccessful PAV samples Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74PCT Description Number of unsuccessful PAV samples

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - pen
item.description: DEVICE PENDING TIME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74PEN Description DEVICE PENDING TIME

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - psm
item.description: Number of successful PAV samples Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74PSM Description Number of successful PAV samples

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - que
item.description: NUMBER OF REQUESTS QUEUED IN IOS FOR THIS DEVICE Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74QUE Description NUMBER OF REQUESTS QUEUED IN IOS FOR THIS DEVICE

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcs
item.description: Flag for SG name changed during the interval Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Description Flag for SG name changed during the interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field clf.

item.title: Field - rnr
item.description: Flag number option active Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Description Flag number option active Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field clf.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rsg
item.description: Flag SG option active Map: SMF74B Based on: clf Description Flag SG option active Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field clf.

item.title: Field - rsv
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74RSV Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - s15
item.description: Reg 15 after SMS interface call (SSI RC) Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74S15 Description Reg 15 after SMS interface call (SSI RC)

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - sbr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read bytes transferred (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SBR Description Number of synchronous I/O read bytes transferred (long floating point)

item.title: Field - sbw
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write bytes transferred (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SBW Description Number of synchronous I/O write bytes transferred (long floating point)

item.title: Field - scmr
item.description: Number of cache miss conditions for synchronous I/O read requests (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SCMR Description Number of cache miss conditions for synchronous I/O read requests (short floating point)

item.title: Field - scs
item.description: Subchannel Set the device is situated Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SCS Description Subchannel Set the device is situated

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - ser
item.description: VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER OF MOUNTED VOLUME Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SER Description VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER OF MOUNTED VOLUME

item.title: Field - sftr
item.description: Elapsed (fail) time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for unsuccessful synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SFTR Description Elapsed (fail) time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for unsuccessful synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point)

item.title: Field - sftw
item.description: Elapsed (fail) time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for unsuccessful synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SFTW Description Elapsed (fail) time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for unsuccessful synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point)

item.title: Field - sgf
item.description: Flag to cause sort by SG Map: SMF74A Based on: dcf Description Flag to cause sort by SG Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dcf.

item.title: Field - sgn
item.description: Storage Group Name Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SGN Description Storage Group Name

item.title: Field - shr
item.description: ON = device is shared/assigned to multiple systems Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Description ON = device is shared/assigned to multiple systems Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field dts.

item.title: Field - shv
item.description: ON = SMF74SHR indication is valid Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Description ON = SMF74SHR indication is valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field dts.

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - sir
item.description: =1 Device is capable of synch I/O read requests Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Description =1 Device is capable of synch I/O read requests Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field cn2.

item.title: Field - siw
item.description: =1 Device is capable of synch I/O write requests Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Description =1 Device is capable of synch I/O write requests Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cn2.

item.title: Field - slbr
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read link busy conditions (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SLBR Description Number of synchronous I/O read link busy conditions (short floating point)

item.title: Field - slbw
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write link busy conditions (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SLBW Description Number of synchronous I/O write link busy conditions (short floating point)

item.title: Field - sme
item.description: SMS Interface Error Map: SMF74A Based on: dms Description SMS Interface Error Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dms.

item.title: Field - smf
item.description: Logical SMF record flag Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SMF Description Logical SMF record flag Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description msm 0 On = There are more logical SMF records in device class

item.title: Field - snd
item.description: if set: no self desc. device 4-byte device number stored Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Description if set: no self desc. device 4-byte device number stored Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dts.

item.title: Field - snis
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write requests where the write data could not be immediately stored (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SNIS Description Number of synchronous I/O write requests where the write data could not be immediately stored (short floating point)

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - sor
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read requests rejected for other reasons (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SOR Description Number of synchronous I/O read requests rejected for other reasons (short floating point)

item.title: Field - sow
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write requests rejected for other reasons (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SOW Description Number of synchronous I/O write requests rejected for other reasons (short floating point)

item.title: Field - spr
item.description: Processing time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for successful synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SPR Description Processing time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for successful synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point)

item.title: Field - spw
item.description: Processing time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for successful synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SPW Description Processing time (in 0.5 micro- second units) for successful synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point)

item.title: Field - sqr
item.description: Number of successfully completed synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SQR Description Number of successfully completed synchronous I/O read requests (long floating point)

item.title: Field - sqw
item.description: Number of successfully completed synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SQW Description Number of successfully completed synchronous I/O write requests (long floating point)

item.title: Field - src
item.description: Return code from SMS interface (SSOB RC) Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SRC Description Return code from SMS interface (SSOB RC)

item.title: Field - srd
item.description: if set: self desc. device Map: SMF74B Based on: dts Description if set: self desc. device Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dts.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - srs
item.description: Reason code from SMS interface (SSOB RS) Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SRS Description Reason code from SMS interface (SSOB RS)

item.title: Field - ssc
item.description: START SUBCHANNEL (SSCH) COUNT Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74SSC Description START SUBCHANNEL (SSCH) COUNT

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sta
item.description: =1 at interval end online or offline devices indicated to be monitored Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Description =1 at interval end online or offline devices indicated to be monitored Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - stor
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O read timeout conditions (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74STOR Description Number of synchronous I/O read timeout conditions (short floating point)

item.title: Field - stow
item.description: Number of synchronous I/O write timeout conditions (short floating point) Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74STOW Description Number of synchronous I/O write timeout conditions (short floating point)

item.title: Field - sts
item.description: On = model dependent data not available by STSCH Map: SMF74A Based on: enf Description On = model dependent data not available by STSCH Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field enf.

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sub
item.description: UCB DEV TYPE CODE IN RIGHT BYTE Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74SUB Description UCB DEV TYPE CODE IN RIGHT BYTE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - tdt
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yy Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TDT Description IODF creation date mm/dd/yy

item.title: Field - tdy
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yyyy Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TDY Description IODF creation date mm/dd/yyyy

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - tnm
item.description: IODF Name Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TNM Description IODF Name

item.title: Field - tok
item.description: Configuration token Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TOK Description Configuration token

item.title: Field - tot
item.description: NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS IN ALL RECORDS FOR THIS LOGICAL DEVICE CLASS RECORD Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TOT Description NUMBER OF DEVICE DATA SECTIONS IN ALL RECORDS FOR THIS LOGICAL DEVICE CLASS RECORD

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S1 Based on: SMF74TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - tsf
item.description: Suffix of IODF Name Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TSF Description Suffix of IODF Name

item.title: Field - tsr
item.description: Number of small records written during interval Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TSR Description Number of small records written during interval

item.title: Field - ttm
item.description: IODF creation time hh.mm.ss Map: SMF74A Based on: SMF74TTM Description IODF creation time hh.mm.ss

item.title: Field - typ
item.description: UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP FIELD Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74TYP Description UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP FIELD

item.title: Field - utl
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES WHEN THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED, BUT AN SSCH HAD NOT BEEN ISSUED Map: SMF74B Based on: SMF74UTL Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES WHEN THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED, BUT AN SSCH HAD NOT BEEN ISSUED

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vac
item.description: DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Map: SMF74B Based on: cnf Description DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - xpv
item.description: =1 Device in SuperPAV mode Map: SMF74B Based on: cn2 Description =1 Device in SuperPAV mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field cn2.
